articles.author: RTÉ News
articles.title: EMA begins assessing Pfizer jab for those aged 12-15 - RTE.ie
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency has said it has begun evaluating the use of Pfizer-BioNTech's Covid-19 vaccine for those aged 12 to 15, after a similar request in the United States.
articles.content:
The European Medicines Agency has said it has begun evaluating the use of Pfizer-BioNTech's Covid-19 vaccine for those aged 12 to 15, after a similar request in the United States.

articles.title: Badminton: Positive attitude - The Star Online
articles.description: PETALING JAYA: It was not an ending that Viktor Axelsen had wanted at the European Championships but the Dane is ready to move on after testing positive for Covid-19 in Ukraine.

articles.author: Sean Martin
articles.title: Asteroid simulation by NASA and ESA confirms Earth not prepared for major strike - Daily Express
articles.description: AN ASTEROID simulation event held by NASA and the European Space Agency has confirmed has one thing: eventually, a major asteroid is going to strike our planet and we need to prepare better for it.
